Name: Spheritis
About the game: Spheritis is a 3D race & puzzle game where the player controls a ball which properties and special abilities can be changed. Explore the levels and find ways to pass the traps and barriers to reach the exit. Single player campaign: - 17 campaign levels. - 4 difficulties modes. - An unlockable extra game mode. - 8 ball types. - 7 specialball abilities. - 20+ Steam achievements. - Leader boards for all levels and game modes. - Steam cloud support for game saves.
